definitions.definition: Unaffected or unable to be affected by something.
examples: The man was completely impervious to the deception we were trying.

definitions.definition: Preventive of any penetration ; impenetrable , impermeable , particularly of water.
examples: Although patchworked and sagging, the roof proved impervious to the weather.
The old car seemed to be impervious to the wear and tear of age.

main_definition: Unaffected or unable to be affected by something.
secondary_definitions: Preventive of any penetration ; impenetrable , impermeable , particularly of water.
